dialog.text: The picture is half sky and half mountainous terrain. It is rocky on the bottom left.
Do you mean half by horizontally half or vertically half? Also how tall are the mountains?
The top half is the sky and the bottom half is the mountains. The mountains are mostly flat with patches of grass in the middle area of the mountains
Is the mountain far or close to us? And is the mountain snowy or green?
The mountain is far away, and we are seeing it from a high altitude. It is green with patches of grass and rock.
I tried my best. Can you peek at my image and comment on the sky or mountain?
Make the sky take up half of the screen. Add patches of clouds in the sky and some more rocks in the mountain part
What is the color of the sky? Is it bright blue or cloudy?
The sky is bright blue with small clouds in the middle region
Are there any other features in the image?
There is a clump of rocks on the bottom right. There is a small lake slightly to the left of the middle of the image.
How small is the lake? And what is it's shape?
The lake is round and it is very small (about five percent of the image). It is in the distance near the horizon of the picture
Unfortunately I used up all my peeks, but the previous iterations looks pretty close. In the segmentation map, make most of the sky filled with clouds.
